snippet.title: Spacelords - Gamescom 2017 Trailer
snippet.description:
RAIDERS OF THE BROKEN PLANET is now SPACELORDS!
https://spacelordsthegame.com/news/raiders-of-the-broken-planet-reborns-as-spacelords

---

Raiders of the Broken Planet launches on September 22nd for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC. Play the Prologue's two lengthy missions for free: http://store.steampowered.com/app/436180/Raiders_of_the_Broken_Planet__Prologue/
The first Raiders campaign Alien Myths will launch on the same day, priced at €9.99/$9.99/£9.99 for hours of incredible additional content.

--

Learn more about Spacelords: https://spacelordsthegame.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/mercurysteam
